existing_features.title: Update the admin dashboard UI to display the personnel list with columns for First name, Last name, and PT code, using the data returned by `getAdminOverview()`.
Ensure the admin login flow continues to grant access only when the admin access code equals "9876", and show a clear English error message for incorrect codes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin page: allow access via code 9876 and display personnel list with Nome, Cognome, and Codice PT

Update the backend admin overview API so that, after authenticating as admin, the admin dashboard can fetch a list of all trainers (personnel) including each trainer's first name, last name, and PT code.

projectName: Admin dashboard: login with code 9876 and show personnel (first name, last name, PT code)
